meta.name: BTECH DMR-6X2 Pro
meta.brief: Basically the same codeplug as the DMR6X2 but with increased call-sign DB size, more roaming options, bluetooth and FM APRS RX.
meta.description: Documents the codeplug format for the BTECH DMR-6X2 UV device.

meta.name: Channel banks
meta.description: A series of channel banks.

meta.name: Channel bank
meta.description: A series of channels.

meta.name: Channel
meta.description: Encodes a FM or DMR channel.

meta.name: RX frequency
meta.description: Encodes the RX frequency in 10Hz.

meta.name: TX frequency offset
meta.description: Encodes the RX frequency in 10Hz.

item.name: simplex
item.description: Transmit frequency offset is ignored. Transmit and receive frequencies are the same.

item.name: positive
item.description: Transmit frequency offset is positive. Transmit frequency lays above the receive frequency.

item.name: positive
item.description: Transmit frequency offset is negative. Transmit frequency lays below the receive frequency.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.description: Specifies the FM bandwidth to use.

item.name: narrow
item.description: The FM bandwidth is set to 12.5kHz.

item.name: wide
item.description: The FM bandwidth is set to 25kHz.

meta.name: 2-tone Function Index
meta.brief: Specifies the index (+1) of the 2-tone function.
meta.description: If set to 0, 2-tone decoding is disabled.

meta.name: AES Encryption Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the AES encryption key index.
meta.description: The index is 1-based. 0=None.

meta.name: PTT ID
meta.brief: Specifies, if and how an analog PTT ID is send.

item.name: Off
item.description: No PTT ID is send.

item.name: Start
item.description: PTT ID is send at the start of a trasmission.

item.name: End
item.description: PTT ID is send at the end of a transmission.

item.name: Both
item.description: PTT ID is send at the start and end of a transmission.

meta.name: 2-Tone ID
meta.brief: Specifies the index (+1) of the 2-tone PTT ID to send (if enabled).
meta.description: If set to 0, no ID is specified.

meta.name: DMR Encryption Type
meta.brief: Specifies the encryption type used. This is either DMR "basic" or "enhanced"

meta.name: DMR Encryption Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the DMR/Enhanced encryption key index.
meta.description: The index is 1-based. If 0, no key is associated with the channel.

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.description: ffh if not set/used.

meta.name: FM APRS PTT Mode
meta.description: Specifies when the position is send via the associated FM-APRS system.

item.name: Off
item.description: Disables FM APRS PTT

item.name: Start
item.description: Transmits the postion via FM-APRS at the start of transmission.

item.name: End
item.description: Transmits the position via FM-APRS at the end of the transmission.

meta.name: Channel Extension Banks
meta.brief: A series of channel extension banks corresponding to each encoded channel bank.

meta.name: Channel extension bank
meta.brief: Encodes several channel extensions corresponding to each encoded channel.

meta.name: Channel extension
meta.brief: Encodes additional channel information.

meta.name: ARC4 Encryption Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the ARC4 encryption key index.
meta.description: Index is stored idx+1, 0=Off.

meta.name: VFO Channel
meta.description: Encodes a FM or DMR channel.

meta.name: RX frequency
meta.description: Encodes the RX frequency in 10Hz.

meta.name: TX frequency offset
meta.description: Encodes the RX frequency in 10Hz.

item.name: simplex
item.description: Transmit frequency offset is ignored. Transmit and receive frequencies are the same.

item.name: positive
item.description: Transmit frequency offset is positive. Transmit frequency lays above the receive frequency.

item.name: positive
item.description: Transmit frequency offset is negative. Transmit frequency lays below the receive frequency.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.description: Specifies the FM bandwidth to use.

item.name: narrow
item.description: The FM bandwidth is set to 12.5kHz.

item.name: wide
item.description: The FM bandwidth is set to 25kHz.

meta.name: 2-tone Function Index
meta.brief: Specifies the index (+1) of the 2-tone function.
meta.description: If set to 0, 2-tone decoding is disabled.

meta.name: AES Encryption Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the AES encryption key index.
meta.description: The index is 1-based. 0=None.

meta.name: PTT ID
meta.brief: Specifies, if and how an analog PTT ID is send.

item.name: Off
item.description: No PTT ID is send.

item.name: Start
item.description: PTT ID is send at the start of a trasmission.

item.name: End
item.description: PTT ID is send at the end of a transmission.

item.name: Both
item.description: PTT ID is send at the start and end of a transmission.

meta.name: 2-Tone ID
meta.brief: Specifies the index (+1) of the 2-tone PTT ID to send (if enabled).
meta.description: If set to 0, no ID is specified.

meta.name: DMR Encryption Type
meta.brief: Specifies the encryption type used. This is either DMR "basic" or "enhanced"

meta.name: DMR Encryption Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the DMR/Enhanced encryption key index.
meta.description: The index is 1-based. If 0, no key is associated with the channel.

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.description: ffh if not set/used.

meta.name: FM APRS PTT Mode
meta.description: Specifies when the position is send via the associated FM-APRS system.

item.name: Off
item.description: Disables FM APRS PTT

item.name: Start
item.description: Transmits the postion via FM-APRS at the start of transmission.

item.name: End
item.description: Transmits the position via FM-APRS at the end of the transmission.

meta.name: Channel extension
meta.brief: Encodes additional channel information.

meta.name: ARC4 Encryption Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the ARC4 encryption key index.
meta.description: Index is stored idx+1, 0=Off.

meta.name: Roaming channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single roaming channel.

meta.name: RX frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the RX frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: TX frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the transmit frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is encoded in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Color code override
meta.brief: Specifies the color code to override the current channels setting with.
meta.description: If set to 16 (10h), there is no override.

meta.name: Time slot override
meta.brief: Specifies if and how the current channels time slot gets overridden.

item.name: None
item.description: If selected, the current channels time slot will not be overridden.

meta.name: Roaming zone
meta.brief: Encodes a single roaming.

meta.name: Roaming channel index
meta.brief: Set to 0xff if empty

meta.name: Name
meta.brief: Specifies the name of the roaming zone.

meta.name: Priority channel 1 index
meta.description: Global channel index +1, 0=Current channel, ffffh = Off.

meta.name: Priority Channel 2 index
meta.description: Global channel index +1, 0=Current channel, ffffh=Off.

meta.name: Look back time A
meta.description: Look back time in 100ms . E.g, 5=0.5s, 1=0.6s, ..., 50=5.0.

meta.name: Lookback time B
meta.description: Look back time in 100ms. I.e., 5=0.5s, ..., 50=5.0s.

meta.name: Dwell time
meta.description: Dwell time in 100ms, 1=0.1, ..., 50=5.0s.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.description: Global channel index, ffffh=unused.

meta.name: Next message index
meta.description: 0-based. If end of list 0xff.

meta.name: This message index
meta.description: 0-based

meta.name: Tone duration
meta.brief: Duration is encoded in ms. Valid values are 30ms - 100ms.

meta.name: ID
meta.brief: Up to 40 digits

meta.name: Digit
meta.brief: Encodes a single ID digit.

meta.name: 5-Tone functions
meta.brief: Defines up to 16 functions, that can be triggered by a 5-tone id.

meta.name: 5-Tone function
meta.brief: Configures a single function

meta.name: ID Length
meta.brief: Specifies the length of the id.

meta.name: ID digit
meta.brief: Encodes a single ID digit. Valid values are 0-9, A-F. Encoded as 0-15.

meta.name: Symbol Interval
meta.brief: Valid values 0-15.

meta.name: Group Code
meta.brief: Valid values 0-15
meta.description: Disabled if ffh.

meta.name: Tone Delay
meta.brief: Tone delay in 10ms.

meta.name: First digit duration
meta.brief: Duration in 10ms.
meta.description: Valid values 0-2500ms

meta.name: Auto Reset Time
meta.brief: In multiple of 10s.

meta.name: Post-tone delay.
meta.brief: Delay in multiple of 10ms before EOT.

meta.name: PTT Id Pause
meta.brief: Pause between PTT Id transmissions in multiple of 10s.

meta.name: D-Code Pause
meta.brief: In seconds.

meta.name: 2-Tone Id
meta.brief: Encodes a single 2-tone id.

meta.name: First tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Second tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the tone frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Name
meta.brief: The name of the id.

meta.name: 2-Tone Id bitmap
meta.brief: Specifies, which 2-tone id is valid.

meta.name: First tone duration
meta.brief: Encodes the first tone duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 500-10000ms.

meta.name: Second tone duration
meta.brief: Specifies the second tone duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 500ms - 10000ms.

meta.name: Long tone duration
meta.brief: Encodes the duration in terms of 100ms. Valid values are 500 - 10000ms.

meta.name: Gap duration
meta.brief: Encodes the gap duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 0 - 2000ms.

meta.name: Reset period
meta.brief: Encodes the reset period in seconds. Valid values are 0 - 250s.

meta.name: Side tone
meta.brief: Enables side tone.

meta.name: DTMF/5Tomn id index
meta.brief: 0-based index of DTMF or 5-tone id.

meta.name: Alarm duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm TX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm transmit duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm RX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm RX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm channel index
meta.brief: Must be a 0-based index to an analog channel.

meta.name: Emergency cycle
meta.brief: 0 = continuous, otherwise count 1...255.

meta.name: Alarm duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm TX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the TX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm RX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm RX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the index the alarm channel. Must be an index of a DMR channel.

meta.name: Emergency cycle
meta.brief: 0=Continous, else number of cycles.

meta.name: Voice switch broadcast
meta.brief: Some bull shit. Likely a period in minutes+1. Of regular transmissions. That is 0=1m, 1=2m,...

meta.name: Area switch broadcast
meta.brief: Uh, the engineerd absolutely gave a shit. This is some other time interval. This time in seconds+1. That is, 0=1s, 1=2s, ...

meta.name: DMR encryption keys
meta.brief: Encodes the set of basic DMR encryption keys.
meta.description: This key only has 16bits. So it is utterly useless. This is also true for the so-called "enhanced" encryption key.

meta.name: DMR encryption key
meta.brief: The actual encryption key.

meta.name: DMR Enhanced Encryption Keys
meta.brief: Encodes the set of "enhanced" DMR encryption keys.

meta.name: DMR Encryption Key
meta.brief: Encodes a single DMR enhanced encryption key.
meta.description: There is nothing enhanced about this encryption. The effective key size is still 16bit.

meta.name: Offset frequency in 10Hz
meta.brief: Disabled if set to 0.

meta.name: 2-Tone functions
meta.brief: Encodes up to 16 two-tone functions.

meta.name: First tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency of the first tone.
meta.description: The value is stored in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Second tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency of the second tone.
meta.description: The value is stored in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Enable bit
meta.brief: Enables a single DTMF function.

meta.name: Enable bit
meta.brief: Enables a single 5-tone function.

meta.name: DTMF Functions
meta.brief: Up to 250 DTMF functions.

meta.name: DTMF Function
meta.brief: Specifies a single DTMF funciton

meta.name: ID
meta.brief: Encodes the fixed size ID. If an ID is shorter, it gets prepended with 0s.

meta.name: ID Digit
meta.brief: A single ID digit.

meta.name: Function
meta.brief: The function to perform, when the code is received.

meta.name: Function Name
meta.brief: Specifies the function name.

meta.name: 5-Tone Functions
meta.brief: Encodes up to 250 5-tone functions.

meta.name: 5-Tone Function
meta.brief: Encodes a single 5-tone function.

meta.name: Standard
meta.brief: Specifies the 5-tone standard.

meta.name: Tone Duration
meta.brief: Specifies the tone duration in ms. Valid values depend on the chosen standard.

meta.name: Display mode
meta.brief: Specifies the work mode. That is VFO/Channel.

meta.name: Transmit timeout
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit timeout in multiles of 30s.
meta.description: That is, the timeout is T = n*30s, where n=0 disables the transmit timeout.

meta.name: Boot display
meta.description: Specifies, what is show during boot.

meta.name: Squelch Level VFO A
meta.brief: Valid values 0=Open, 1, ..., 5.

meta.name: Squelch Level VFO B
meta.brief: Valid values 0=Open, 1, ..., 5

meta.name: VOX Level
meta.brief: Specifies the VOX level: 0=Off, 1, ..., 3.

meta.name: VOX Delay
meta.brief: Delay in (n+5) * 100ms.

meta.name: VFO Scan Mode
meta.brief: Specifies, how the scan behaves, once a signal is received.

item.name: Time
item.description: Scan continues after a specified time.

item.name: Carrier
item.description: Scan continues, after end of transmisison.

item.name: End
item.description: Ends the scan once a singal is found.

meta.name: Microphone Gain
meta.brief: Specifies the mic gain. Valid values 0=1, ..., 4=5.

meta.name: PF1 short press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a short press of PF1.

meta.name: PF2 short press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a short press of PF2.

meta.name: PF3 short press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a short press of PF3.

meta.name: P1 short press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a short press of P1.

meta.name: P2 short press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a short press of P2.

meta.name: Work Mode VFO A
meta.brief: Specifies the work mode for VFO A.

meta.name: Squelch Tail Elimination
meta.brief: Sets the STE type.

meta.name: Group Call Hang Time
meta.brief: Specifies the duration in seconds. Valid values are 1, ..., 30s, 31=unlimited.

meta.name: Private Call Hang Time
meta.brief: Specifies the duration in seconds. Valid values are 1, ..., 30, 31=unlimited.

meta.name: Voice header repetition
meta.brief: The count is stored as n+2. Valid values are 2,...,8

meta.name: TX Preamble Duration
meta.brief: Stroed in multiples of 60ms. Valid values are 0, ..., 2400ms.

meta.name: WFM Channel Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the current WFM channel index.

meta.name: Memory Zone A Index
meta.brief: Specifies the current Zone for VFO A.

meta.name: Memory Zone B Index
meta.brief: Specifies the zone index for the VFO B.

meta.name: Display brightness
meta.brief: Valid values 0-4.
meta.description: Brightness level-1, levels=1, ..., 5.

meta.name: Main Channel
meta.brief: Specifies the current active VFO (A or B).

meta.name: VOX Source
meta.brief: Specifies the VOX trigger source. This can either be the internal, external or both microphones.

meta.name: Menu display duration
meta.brief: T = (n+1) * 5s. Valid values 5-60s.
meta.description: In multiples of 5s + 5s. 0=5s, 1=10s, 2=15s, ..., 11=60s.

meta.name: Enable Filter Own ID From Missed Calls
Max Speaker Volume
meta.brief: Specifies the maximum speaker volume 0=Indoors, 1, ..., 8.

meta.name: PF1 long press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a long press of PF1.

meta.name: PF2 long press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a long press of PF2.

meta.name: PF3 long press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a long press of PF3.

meta.name: P1 long press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a long press of P1.

meta.name: P2 long press function
meta.brief: Specifies the function for a long press of P2.

meta.name: Long Press Duration
meta.brief: Specifies the duration in (n+1) seconds. Valid values are 1, ..., 5 seconds.

meta.name: Autorepeater VFO A
meta.brief: Enables and specifies the direction of the auto-repeater function.

meta.name: FM Call Hang Time
meta.brief: Specifies the FM call hang time in seconds. Valid values are 0, ..., 30s.

meta.name: Max Headphone Volume
meta.brief: Specifies the maximum head-phone volume. Valid values: 0=Indoors, 1, ..., 8.

meta.name: VFO Scan UHF Min Frequency
meta.brief: Lower bound of the UHF VFO scan range. Frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: VFO Scan UHF Max Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the upper bound of the VFO scan frequency range.
meta.description: The frequency is encoded in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: VFO Scan VHF Min Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the lower bound of the VFO scan frequency range.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: VFO Scan VHF Max Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the VFO scan upper bound frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Auto Repeater UHF Offset Index
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the UHF repeater offset frequency. If set to ffh, is it disabled.

meta.name: Auto Repeater VHF Offset Index
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the VHF auto-repater offset frequency. If set to ffh, the function is disabled.

meta.name: Priority Zone Index VFO A
meta.brief: The index is 0-based. An index of ffh, implies no priority zone.

meta.name: Priority Zone Index VFO B
meta.brief: 0-based index, a value of ffh imples no priority zone.

meta.name: Call alert tone
meta.description: Consists of 5 tones.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.description: Frequency in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.description: In 10ms. Limited to 200ms.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.description: Frequency in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.description: Duration in 10ms.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.description: Frequency in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.description: Duration in 10ms.

meta.name: Record delay
meta.brief: Specifies the record delay in multiples of 0.2s.

meta.name: Call-sign display mode
meta.description: Specifies, what is show from the call-sign DB.

meta.name: Ranging interval
meta.brief: Duration in seconds, Valid values 1-255.
meta.description: Interval in seconds. Valid range [5,255].

meta.name: Key tone volume
meta.brief: Specifies the key tone volume. If set to 0, it means it is adjustable.
meta.description: Specifies the key tone volume. If set to 0, it is user adjustable.

meta.name: Enable Professional Key Lock
meta.brief: WTF?!?

meta.name: Enable Show Last Call on Launch
Auto-repeater VHF min Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the lower-bound of the auto-repeater VHF range.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Auto-repeater VHF max Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the upper-bound of the auto-repeater VHF range.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Auto-repeater UHF min Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the lower-bound of the auto-repeater UHF range.

meta.name: Auto-repeater UHF max Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the upper bound of the auto-repeater UHF range.

meta.name: Auto repeater VFO B
meta.brief: Enables and specifies the direction of the auto-repeater function.

meta.name: Enable Address book is send with own code
Default zone A index
meta.description: Specifies the index of the boot zone for VFO A. Index is 0-based.

meta.name: Default zone B index
meta.description: Index of the boot zone for VFO B. Index is 0-based.

meta.name: Default Channel A Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the channel within the zone. If set to ff, the VFO is selected at boot.
meta.description: Index of channel within default zone. 0xff for VFO.

meta.name: Default Channel B Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the channel within the zone. If set to ff, the VFO is selected at boot.
meta.description: Channel index within default zone. If ffh, VFO is selected.

meta.name: Keep last caller
meta.description: If enabled, the last caller is kept on a channel switch.

meta.name: RX backlight duration
meta.brief: Duration specified in second. If set to 0, backlight is always on.
meta.description: Specifies the number of second, the backlight stays on during the reception of a call. Values 0, ..., 30. 0=Always.

meta.name: Manual Dial Group Call Hang Time
meta.brief: The duration is specified in seconds. Valid values are 1, ..., 30, 31=unlimited.

meta.name: Manual Dial Private Call Hang Time
meta.brief: The duration is specified in seconds. Valid values are 1, ..., 30s, 31=infinite.

meta.name: DTMF Ids
meta.brief: Encodes DTMF PTT ids.

meta.name: DTMF digit
meta.brief: Valid values 0h - fh. If not set, ffh.

meta.name: FM APRS TX delay
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit FM APRS delay in multiple of 20ms. Valid values are 0-5100ms.

meta.name: FM APRS sub tone type
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit sub-tone for FM APRS.

meta.name: FM APRS DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: That is, the least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code and 9th bit encodes the inverted flag of DCS.

meta.name: Manual TX interval
meta.brief: Specifies the manual TX interval in second. 0: Off, 1-255.

meta.name: Automatic TX interval
meta.brief: Specifies the interval in multiples of 30s. 0:Off. Valid values 30-7650s.

meta.name: Latitude degree
meta.brief: Encodes the first position latitude degree value.

meta.name: APRS path string 0-14h
meta.brief: First half of the APRS path string. Contains the first 24 bytes.

meta.name: APRS symbol table
meta.brief: A char!

meta.name: APRS symbol
meta.brief: A char!

meta.name: Prewave delay
meta.brief: Specifies the pre-wave delay in multiples of 10ms. Valid values are 0-2550ms.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: 0-based transmit channel. 0fa0=VFO A, 0fa1=VFO B, 0fa2=Current

meta.name: Repeater activation delay
meta.brief: Delay in multiples of 100ms. 0=Off.
meta.description: Valid values are Off, 100ms, ..., 1000ms.

meta.name: Roaming Zone Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the roaming zone.
meta.description: The default value is not defined. There is a bug in the manufacturer CPS requireing at least one roaming zone to prevent the CPS from crashing.

meta.name: Repeater out-of-range reminder
meta.brief: Specifies the number of reminders that the current repeater is out-of-range.
meta.description: The count is stored n-1. That is, 0=1 times, 1=2 times, ..., 9=10 times.

meta.name: Repeater check interval
meta.brief: Specifies the interval in (n+1)*5s. Valid values are 5s ... 50s.

meta.name: Repeater reconnections
meta.brief: Count is specified in n+3. Valid values are 3,4 & 5.

meta.name: Auto-roaming interval
meta.brief: Specified in n+1 minutes. Valid values 1, ..., 256min.

meta.name: Roaming delay
meta.brief: Specifies the roaming delay in seconds. 0=Off.

meta.name: Mute Timeout
meta.brief: Specifies a mute timeout in multiples of 1minute. The timeout is stored as n+1 minutes. Valid values are 1, ..., 256 minutes.

meta.name: Bluetooth Mic Gain
meta.brief: Valid values 0, ..., 4

meta.name: Bluetooth Speaker Gain
meta.brief: Valid values 0, ..., 5.

meta.name: Bluetooth hold duration
meta.brief: Ecoded as a list 0=Off, 1=1s, ..., 30=30s, 31=60s, 32=120s, 33=infinite.

meta.name: Bluetooth hold delay
meta.brief: 0=30ms, else: n*0.5s.

meta.name: Bluetooth sleep delay
meta.brief: 0=Infinite, 1=1min, ..., 4=4min.

meta.name: FM Mic Gain
meta.brief: Valid values are 0, ..., 4.

meta.name: Show Channel Index Within Zone
meta.brief: If set to 0, the overall channel index is shown.

meta.name: Fixed Location Index
meta.brief: Fixed location index +1, if set to 0, GPS is used.

meta.name: Satellite FM Squelch Level
meta.brief: 0, ..., 5. Default 0=open.

meta.name: APRS filter
meta.brief: Encodes a single APRS filter based on call and SSID.

meta.name: Call
meta.brief: Specifies the call to filter.

meta.name: SSID
meta.brief: Specifies the SSID of the call. Valid values 0h-fh, 10h = Off.

meta.name: GPS Roaming Setttings
meta.brief: Exactly 32 GPS roaming area settings.

meta.name: Roaming Zone Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based roaming zone index.
meta.description: If set to ffh, no zone is associated.

meta.name: Latitude Seconds
meta.brief: Again, stored as a 1/100 fraction of a minute.

meta.name: Longitude Seconds
meta.brief: Stored as 1/100 of a minute.

meta.name: Radius
meta.brief: Specifies the roaming radius in unkown units.

meta.name: Analog Contact Index
meta.brief: 0-based index, ffh=none.

meta.name: Type
meta.brief: Specifies the hot-key action type.

meta.name: Contact Index
meta.brief: 0-based index, ffffffffh = none.
meta.description: Used for both, FM and DMR contacts.

meta.name: Message Index
meta.brief: 0-based SMS message index or status message index. ffh = none.

meta.name: AES encryption key bank
meta.brief: Encodes up to 255 256bit AES keys.

meta.name: Key Id
meta.brief: Stores the key ID.
meta.description: The ID is 1-based, where 0=Off.

element.unused:
256 bit key data Encodes up to 256 bit of key data. If the key is smaller than 256bit, it gets stored right-aligned. That is, 0-bits are added to the front to extend the size to 256bits. 1.21b
00

meta.name: Key Size
meta.brief: Specifies the key-size in nibbles.
meta.description: That is, in multiples of 4bits.

meta.name: Key ID
meta.brief: Valid values are 1-255, 0 means disabled.

meta.name: Key data
meta.brief: Raw key data

meta.name: DTMF contact diable byte
meta.brief: The byte encodes 0=enabled and ff=disabled.

meta.name: DTMF Number
meta.brief: Exactly 14 4-bit digits. Unused digits are set to 0.

meta.name: DTMF Digit
meta.brief: Encodes the DTMF digits as 0-9, A-D, *, #.

meta.name: Contact Index
meta.brief: 0-based

meta.name: Orbital Element Sets
meta.brief: Holds the orbital elements for some sattelites.

meta.name: Orbital Element
meta.brief: Holds the (TLE) orbital elements for a single sat.

meta.name: Satellite Name
meta.brief: Simple ASCII string.
meta.description: Unused chars are stored as space.

meta.name: Epoch Year
meta.brief: The two-digit year with leading 0.

meta.name: Epoch Julien Day
meta.brief: Fractional Julien day in format ddd.ffffffff. The 3-digit ddd part is the day of year with leading zeros, while the 8-digit ffffffff encodes the fractional part of the day.

meta.name: First derivative mean motion
meta.brief: Encodes the fractional value as s.ffffffff, where s is the sign. Either " " or "-" and the 8-digit field ffffffff contains the fractional part.

meta.name: Inclination
meta.brief: Ecodes the inclination in degrees as ddd.ffff, where 3-digit ddd is the integer part. Leading zeros are not stored but replaced with spaces (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit ffff is the fractional part.

meta.name: Right ascension of the ascending node
meta.brief: Ecodes the ascension in degrees as ddd.ffff, where 3-digit ddd is the integer part. Leading zeros are not stored but replaced with spaces (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit ffff is the fractional part.

meta.name: Eccentricity
meta.brief: Stores the fractional part of the eccentricity as a 7-digit number with leading zeros.

meta.name: Argument of perigee
meta.brief: Stores the argument of perigee in degrees, stored as ddd.ffff. The 3-digit ddd field holds the integer part, where leading zeros are stored as space (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit ffff field holds the fractional part.

meta.name: Mean anomaly
meta.brief: Stores the mean anomaly in degrees as ddd.ffff. The 3-digit ddd part holds the integer part, where leading zeros are replaced by space (ASCII 20h). The 4-digit field ffff contains the fractional part.

meta.name: Mean motion
meta.brief: Encodes the mean motion as dd.ffffffff. The 2-digit field dd encodes the integer part, where leading zeros are stored as space (ASCII 20h). The 8-digit ffffffff part encodes the fractional part.

meta.name: Revolution number at epoch
meta.brief: Encodes the revoution number as 5-digit field ddddd. Leading zeros are stored.

meta.name: FM Downlink Frequency
meta.brief: Stores the frequency in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: FM Uplink Frequency
meta.brief: Stores the frequency in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Uplink DCS code
meta.brief: The least significant 9 bit encode the DCS code 000h-1ffh. The 10-th bit encodes the inversion flag. That is D023I is encoded as 0213h, and D777I as 03ffh.

meta.name: Downlink DCS
meta.brief: The least significant 9 bit encode the DCS code 000h-1ffh. The 10-th bit encodes the inversion flag. That is D023I is encoded as 0213h, and D777I as 03ffh.

meta.name: APRS Uplink Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the APRS transmit (uplink) frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is specified in multiples of 10Hz. If no frequency is set, the value is ffffffffh.

meta.name: Arm sub tone type
meta.brief: Specifies the subtone type to be send for arming the satellite.

item.name: None
item.description: No arm subtone is send.

meta.name: Arm DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: DMR ID and Group Call Flag
meta.brief: DMR Id (bcd8be << 1) | GCF

meta.name: DMR ID and Group Call Flag
meta.brief: DMR Id (bcd8be << 1) | GCF

meta.name: Entry Count
meta.brief: Specifies the number of entries in the call-sign database.

meta.name: End-of-database address
meta.brief: Absolute memory address of the end-of-database.

meta.name: Description
meta.brief: A 0-separated list of strings. Containing name, city, call, state, country, comment.
